item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

This is a normal page using the Full Width page template. You can add any type of elements on this page, WooCommerce products included. All available products are listed below using a Four Column layout. You can easily change the number of columns. Also you can show products only form certain categories, display Product on Sale, and add any available element of Visual Composer to create the perfect shop page.

item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: ASOS Slim Blazer 100% Wool in Grey
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
ASOS menswear shuts down the new season with the latest trends and the coolest products, designed in London and sold across the world. Update your go-to garms with the new shapes and fits from our ASOS design team, from essential tees to on-point outerwear, and jeans from skinny to straight and beyond.
  • Pure wool
  • Lined with internal pocket
  • Notch lapels
  • Two button opening
  • Functional pockets
  • Slim fit - cut close to the body
  • Dry clean
  • 100% Wool
  • Our model wears a 40"/102 cm and is 189cm/6'2.5" tall
ABOUT MEBody: 100% Wool, Body Lining: 100% Polyester. SIZE & FIT Model's height: 6'2.5”/189 cm Model is wearing: 40"/102 cmLOOK AFTER MEDry Clean Only

item.title: Denim & Supply T-Shirt With Long Sleeves
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
ABOUT DENIM & SUPPLY BY RALPH LAUREN With the latest addition to the Ralph Lauren family,Denim & Supply by Ralph Lauren brings forward an innovative line of premium denim. Bohemian in spirit, and with an emphasis on genuine roots and individuality, Denim & Supply by Ralph Lauren looks to Navajo, nautical and surplus influences across a rugged, wearable range.
  • Soft-touch cotton jersey
  • Henley neck
  • Printed button placket
  • Long sleeves
  • Regular fit - true to size
  • Machine wash
  • 100% Cotton
  • Our model wears a size Medium and is 189cm/6'2.5" tall
ABOUT ME Main: 100% Cotton. SIZE & FIT Model's height: 6'2.5”/189 cm Model is wearing: Size Medium LOOK AFTER ME Machine Wash According To Instructions On Care Label

item.dc:creator: rockystef

item.title: Dr Martens Original 8-Eye Boots
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
Since its creation in the 1960s, the classic Dr Martens eight eyelet boot was once an iconic footwear choice for punks, skinheads and working class rebels the world over. With technical construction that ensures each shoe or boot is durable, resistant and comfortable; Dr Martens have built a reputation on the exceptional quality of their footwear. Today, Dr Martens has retained its trademark designs but added a fresh, contemporary twist with the addition of coloured soles, soft suedes, bright colours and bold prints. Boots by Dr Martens
  • Smooth leather
  • Lace-up fastening
  • Eight eyelet placket
  • Back tab
  • Cushioned sole
  • Textured grip tread
  • Treat with a leather protector
  • 100% Real Leather upper
  • Supplier code: 118220006
LOOK AFTER ME Treat With A Suitable Leather Protector (Not Included) And Avoid Contact With Liquids ABOUT ME Upper: 100% Real Leather, Sole: 100% Other Materials, Lining: 50% Real Leather, 50% Textile.
item.excerpt:encoded: This is a demo product. Since its creation in the 1960s, the classic Dr Martens eight eyelet boot was once an iconic footwear choice for punks, skinheads and working class rebels the world over. With technical construction that ensures each shoe or boot is durable, resistant and comfortable; Dr Martens have built a reputation on the exceptional quality of their footwear. Today, Dr Martens has retained its trademark designs but added a fresh, contemporary twist with the addition of coloured soles, soft suedes, bright colours and bold prints.

item.title: Nike SB Portmore Trainers In Red
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
Balancing premium style and unmatched innovation, Nike Skateboarding is committed to inspiring and supporting the world of skateboarding. With their own pro skate team lead by their signature athlete Paul Rodriguez, Nike Skateboarding produce a line of trainers and apparel, releasing classic Dunk low skate trainers in refreshed colourways alongside their newest signature styles. SB Portmore trainers by Nike Skateboarding
  • Suede upper
  • Lace-up fastening
  • Padded cuffs for comfort
  • Signature swoosh logo
  • Textured tread
  • Treat with a leather protector
  • 65% Real Leather, 28% Textile, 7% Other Materials Upper
  • Supplier code: 725027-602
LOOK AFTER ME Treat With A Suitable Leather Protector (Not Included) And Avoid Contact With Liquids ABOUT ME Lining: 100% Textile, Sole: 100% Rubber, Upper: 65% Real Leather, 28% Textile, 7% Other Materials.

item.title: Polo Ralph Lauren Aviator Sunglasses
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded:
Naming his brand after a sport that embodied a world of classic style, Ralph Lauren created Polo Ralph Lauren in 1967 as a label initially selling men's ties. The label quickly grew and redefined American style with their signature preppy menswear. The now iconic Polo Ralph Lauren polo shirt was introduced in 1972 in twenty four colours and instantly became a classic, offering both quality construction and wide variety. Interested in longevity, timelessness and style, Polo Ralph Lauren signifies lasting American menswear that builds upon its rich history of design with seasonal collections that offer effortless style. Sunglasses by Polo Ralph Lauren
  • Metal frames with double bridge
  • Adjustable silicone nose pads for added comfort
  • Reflective lenses
  • Straight arms with curved temple tips for a secure fit
  • Total UV protection
  • Colour of protective case may vary
LOOK AFTER ME Wipe Light Marks With A Soft Cloth ABOUT ME Frame: 100% Metal, Lens: 100% Plastic. FC3, General purpose sunglasses, high protection against sunglare. These sunglasses conform to BSENISO12312-1:2013. Not for direct viewing of the sun or protection against artificial light sources such as in a solarium. Non prescription sunglasses. Not for use as eye protection against mechanical impact. Not suitable for driving in twilight or at night. Do not use abrasive detergents or sprays. Comes with a soft pouch case.

item.title: Andre Pink
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: Nulla lacinia leo ut velit porta, sit amet semper elit maximus. Proin ut nibh malesuada, bibendum dui vitae, porta justo. Mauris vitae odio non enim porta semper. Fusce ut mattis nisi. Mauris sit amet lobortis sapien. Proin cursus posuere dui. Etiam ut purus dolor.

item.title: Michael Townsen
item.dc:creator: rockystef
item.content:encoded: Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Sed at pellentesque elit, eu auctor massa. Nullam varius et orci ut iaculis. Cras venenatis interdum turpis vitae bibendum. Curabitur fermentum ligula quis diam pellentesque, nec vestibulum dolor euismod. Phasellus non pellentesque purus, eget pulvinar metus.
